parent_category.name: Shoes
parent_category.description: An outer covering for the human foot typically having a thick or stiff sole with an attached heel and an upper part of lighter material (such as leather)

child_category.name: Sports shoes
child_category.description: Sports shoes are a category of footwear meticulously engineered for the rigors of athletic activities, featuring advanced materials for breathability and support, specialized cushioning to absorb impact, and performance-driven outsoles, which have since transcended their functional origins to become a defining element of contemporary casual and streetwear fashion.
